content.p: We are doing whatever possible to support Covid-19 efforts locally and nationally. Discover ways you can contribute. There are several ways you can join the fight against the coronavirus, either through research, a secondment or volunteering scheme. We are supportive of any staff member or student who would like to get involved. This guidance outlines what you need to know, and how it might work around teaching, studying, research and other responsibilities. I am a staff member interested in a secondment I am a staff member looking to volunteer my time I want to volunteer research capacity I would like to volunteer while studying I am a student looking to apply for clinical roles I am a student and would like to volunteer I am a reservist who has been called up to support the national effort I want to support staff who are volunteering or on secondment I've read the guidance and I'm looking for ways to volunteer
